languages.text: "Что?!" {n}Хейнрикс порывисто выдыхает, а затем сжимает переносицу двумя пальцами.{/n} "Что ж. Что ж. По крайней мере, объект скверны... если это действительно был он... уничтожен. Это удовлетворительный результат".

traits.locale_text: "Что?!" {n}Хейнрикс порывисто выдыхает, а затем сжимает переносицу двумя пальцами.{/n} "Что ж. Что ж. По крайней мере, объект скверны... если это действительно был он... уничтожен. Это удовлетворительный результат".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."
languages.original_text: "Что?!" {n}Хейнрикс порывисто выдыхает, а затем сжимает переносицу двумя пальцами.{/n} "Что ж. Что ж. По крайней мере, объект скверны... если это действительно был он... уничтожен. Это удовлетворительный результат".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."

traits.locale_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你说什么？”{n}海因里希仿佛被什么东西呛到了一样。他叹了口气，捏着鼻梁。{/n}“好吧，好吧，假设那真的是腐化的造物，至少它已经被摧毁了。这算得上是个令人满意的结果。”
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."

traits.locale_text: “你说什么？”{n}海因里希仿佛被什么东西呛到了一样。他叹了口气，捏着鼻梁。{/n}“好吧，好吧，假设那真的是腐化的造物，至少它已经被摧毁了。这算得上是个令人满意的结果。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué?». {n}Heinrix suelta un jadeo ahogado y se pellizca el puente de la nariz.{/n} «Bueno. Vale. Por lo menos la fuente de la corrupción, si eso es lo que era, ha sido destruido. Es un resultado aceptable».
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué?». {n}Heinrix suelta un jadeo ahogado y se pellizca el puente de la nariz.{/n} «Bueno. Vale. Por lo menos la fuente de la corrupción, si eso es lo que era, ha sido destruido. Es un resultado aceptable».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「何だと？」{n}ハインリックスは息を詰まらせ、鼻筋を抑えた。{/n}「わかった、わかったよ。少なくとも、腐敗の対象は破壊された…はずだ。これは満足のいく結果だ」
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."

traits.locale_text: 「何だと？」{n}ハインリックスは息を詰まらせ、鼻筋を抑えた。{/n}「わかった、わかったよ。少なくとも、腐敗の対象は破壊された…はずだ。これは満足のいく結果だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Comment ? {n}s'exclame Heinrix, puis il se pince le haut du nez.{/n} D'accord. Très bien. Au moins, la source de la corruption a été détruite... en espérant qu'il s'agissait bien de la source. J'imagine qu'il faut s'en réjouir. »
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."

traits.locale_text: « Comment ? » {n}s'exclame Heinrix, puis il se pince le haut du nez.{/n} D'accord. Très bien. Au moins, la source de la corruption a été détruite... en espérant qu'il s'agissait bien de la source. J'imagine qu'il faut s'en réjouir. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Was?" {n}Heinrix keucht und reibt sich über den Nasenrücken.{/n} "Also schön. Gut. Immerhin wurde das Objekt der Verderbnis – wenn es denn tatsächlich eines war – zerstört. Ein zufriedenstellendes Ergebnis."
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."

traits.locale_text: "Was?" {n}Heinrix keucht und reibt sich über den Nasenrücken.{/n} "Also schön. Gut. Immerhin wurde das Objekt der Verderbnis – wenn es denn tatsächlich eines war – zerstört. Ein zufriedenstellendes Ergebnis."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."

languages.text: "Ne?" {n}Heinrix, kısık sesle iç çekip ardından burun kemiğini sıkıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Tamam. Eğer gerçekten bir yozlaşma nesnesiyse en azından yok edilmiştir. Bu, memnun edici bir sonuç."
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}Heinrix lets out a choked gasp, then pinches the bridge of his nose.{/n} "All right. All right. At the very least, the object of corruption — if that is indeed what it was — has been destroyed. This is a satisfactory outcome."
